name: Apple II CFFA Applicard Drivers
short_description:
After discussion on supporting Apple CP/M partitions on Rich Drehers excellent CFFA board which provides CF card based virtual hard drive storage for vintage Apple II machines (as well as an IDE interface!)

Bob Applegate has worked on drivers and gotten them running but still more work needs to be done so he has been kind enough to provide the disks to me to be imaged and made available to the Apple II community. Since Gord Tulloch has a fully working hardware environment he agreed to image all the disks Bob had and get everything online. You are logged onto the result! Enjoy!
summary: Development of a native Applicard CP/M driver for CFFA
